survey_name: Workplace Flexibility and Job Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee perceptions of workplace flexibility and its impact on job satisfaction and productivity.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current level of flexibility in your work schedule?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current level of flexibility in your work schedule?

questions.question_text: Which of the following flexible work arrangements do you currently utilize? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an option for those who do not use any flexible arrangements.

script.question_text: Which of the following flexible work arrangements do you currently utilize? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How has workplace flexibility impacted your overall job satisfaction?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure the question is clear and avoids leading language.

script.question_text: How has workplace flexibility impacted your overall job satisfaction?

questions.question_text: What challenges, if any, have you faced with workplace flexibility?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What challenges, if any, have you faced with workplace flexibility?

questions.question_text: How often do you communicate with your team when working flexibly?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale. Ensure options cover a realistic range of communication patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you communicate with your team when working flexibly?

questions.question_text: Which tools do you find most helpful for maintaining productivity while working flexibly? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other').

script.question_text: Which tools do you find most helpful for maintaining productivity while working flexibly? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate your productivity when working flexibly compared to working in the office?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point comparative scale. Ensure the question is neutral and unbiased.

script.question_text: How would you rate your productivity when working flexibly compared to working in the office?

questions.question_text: What additional support or resources would help you work more effectively in a flexible arrangement?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional support or resources would help you work more effectively in a flexible arrangement?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your organization as a great place to work based on its flexibility policies?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. This question measures advocacy based on flexibility.
